smodifier

Sdescription
#$@text#$@
The initial set of data to apply to the <code><a href="output/Ext.Component.html#Ext.Component-tpl" ext:member="tpl" ext:cls="Ext.Component">tpl</a></code> to
update the content area of the Component.
#$@text#$@

@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Template/@Config/@25480
sname
compiled
stype
boolean
sinputtype
truefalse
sgroup
Template
sdefault
false
Sdescription
#$@text#$@
Specify <tt>true</tt> to compile the template
immediately (see <code><a href="output/Ext.Template.html#Ext.Template-compile" ext:member="compile" ext:cls="Ext.Template">compile</a></code>).
Defaults to <tt>false</tt>.
#$@text#$@
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
